thread.title: FIRST LOOK: Guess Who’s Guest-Starring on Bachelor Twins Emily and Haley Ferguson’s Spin-Off!
thread.title_full: FIRST LOOK: Guess Who’s Guest-Starring on Bachelor Twins Emily and Haley Ferguson’s Spin-Off!

author: Aurelie Corinthios
title: FIRST LOOK: Guess Who’s Guest-Starring on Bachelor Twins Emily and Haley Ferguson’s Spin-Off!
text:
It’s a big ol’ Bachelor reunion!
PEOPLE can exclusively reveal a First Look at Emily and Haley Ferguson’s upcoming spin-off show, The Twins: Happily Ever After? that features their very first guest stars: Ben Higgins and Lauren Bushnell !
Higgins, 28, and his fiancée Bushnell, 26, will appear in both the season premiere and at least one other episode. Of course, the two were the original stars of Freeform’s Happily Ever After? series, which kicked off with a season of Ben and Lauren: Happily Ever After? last year that chronicled the couple’s life after The Bachelor .
The foursome all met during Higgins’ season of The Bachelor , which concluded last March. Haley and Emily, 24, became fan-favorite contestants vying for Higgins’ rose alongside Bushnell, to whom Higgins ultimately proposed . The twins, meanwhile, went on to star in last summer’s Bachelor in Paradise . 

But through it all, the twins have remained close with Bushnell and Higgins: They celebrated the couple’s joint bachelor and bachelorette parties last October and even appeared in a few episodes of Higgins and Bushnell’s own Happily Ever After? season.
RELATED VIDEO: The Bachelor ‘s Ben Higgins Addresses Rumors of a Split from Lauren Bushnell 
 
The Twins: Happily Ever After? will follow the sisters as they move out of their mother’s house in Las Vegas and embark on a brand new journey, searching for independence and new careers. Fingers crossed for another epic switcharoo !
The Twins: Happily Ever After? premieres March 20 at 9 p.m. ET on Freeform.
